description:
As far as plot twist goes, this one is heading towards the Guinness record for the most amount of twisted plots.

We all laughed when we witnessed a man calling into Zoom court while driving for a hearing about a suspended license. But then the headlines started popping up about how bureaucratic incompetence was actually to blame, as his license was supposed to be reinstated two years ago but court staff made a mistake.

And although we gave him the benefit of the doubt, the public was left with more questions than answers.

You have to wonder, how did he not know about the “clerical error” when he went to renew his license? Or what about when he renewed his registration?

None of that matters because the plot just
title: The Man Who Zoomed Court With A Suspended License? The clerical error isn't the crazy part...

description:
Most people would agree that compelled speech is unconstitutional speech, especially when it’s a mandated lie to glorify unexplainable feelings, at the expense of universal truth. But leftists tend to disagree, so much so that if you even think about refusing to “affirm” their truth, they believe you should be canceled into oblivion. And that is exactly what we have here.

A substitute teacher was fired from not one, but TWO schools after he doubled down on “deadnaming” students.

Teacher reveals how he was fired for refusing to call children who identified as trans by their preferred pronouns https://t.co/7Gz2gkVurS pic.twitter.com/r83czYxGX8
— Daily Mail Online (@M
title: Teacher gets fired from TWO schools for refusing to use "preferred" pronouns of confused teens

description:
Somewhere down the leftist lane to insanity, progressives decided that no human is illegal. But even if that was true, it’s not but even if it was, officials need to understand that Americans take precedence over foreign nationals. And even if it was our moral obligation to hand out welfare to people from other countries, it’s not but even if it was, progressives need to understand that citizens take priority over illegal migrants.

But unfortunately, progressives are not what you would call “sane.” Subsequently, Massachusetts will turn a vacant prison in Norfolk into a migrant shelter. And given this painful abuse of fiduciary duties, residents gave city officials a reality check that will likely go unchecked.

Massachusetts held a meeting last night
title: Watch: Massachusetts city announces they're housing more illegals and residents were NOT happy

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

When it comes to the left and their prideful glorification, sane people put up with a lot. And when a heroic officer dies in the line of duty, you would hope that leftists would cool it with their asinine ideology for at least half of the day. But the majority of the Wethersfield City Council refused to do that, as they are solely beholden to leftist dogma.

More than 1,500 people attended the funeral of Trooper Aaron Pelletier, who was fatally killed during a hit-and-run traffic stop after a truck swiped his patrol vehicle and hit him.
title: City Refuses To Fly Thin Blue Line Flag To Honor Fallen Officer, Proudly Flies Pride Flag At Half Staff Instead

On Tuesday we looked at history's 16 biggest dictators and narrowed it down to the top 8. Today’s show determined who is the biggest dic of all time.

The following dictators made the final eight: Ayatollah Khomeini, Mao Zedong, Joseph Stalin, Saddam Hussein, Pol Pot, Fidel Castro, Papa Doc Duvalier, and Kim Jong Il.

By narrowing down the top eight, the following made the final four: Zedong, Stalin, Pot. and D
title: The Great Dictator Dic-Off Round Two: And The "Winner" Is...
